visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data with a custom tooltip format. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a custom background color and margin settings for better visual appeal. The x-axis represents months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents rainfall values in millimeters. The tooltip displays the rainfall value formatted to one decimal place. The data series includes monthly rainfall data with a custom color. The legend is enabled and styled with a specific font size and color. Overall, this configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing representation of the monthly average rainfall data.
